pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, October 25, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, October 25, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion at the Canadian Labour Congress National Young Workers Summit.

Shaw Centre
Room 205
55 Colonel By Drive,
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should present themselves at the Holtzman Boardroom no later than 8:30 a.m.


11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 1:00 p.m.


2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
